articles.title: Arsenal Women 4-0 Brighton Women: Beth Mead hits double as Gunners cruise to victory in WSL opener - Sky Sports
articles.description: Euro 2022 top scorer Beth Mead scored twice as Arsenal cruised to a 4-0 win over Brighton in the delayed WSL season opener, but believes she should have scored more.
articles.content:
Euro 2022 top scorer Beth Mead opened her domestic account for Arsenal with a fine double as the Gunners cruised to a 4-0 win against Brighton in the delayed Women's Super League season opener.
But … [+10284 chars]

articles.author: Gerard Meagher
articles.title: Harlequins baffled after Marcus Smith is forced to miss Saracens match - The Guardian
articles.description: Harlequins have had a request to play the England fly-half rejected while Saracens have been cleared to pick five England internationals
articles.content: Harlequins are frustrated at being unable to select Marcus Smith for Saturdays match against Saracens, who have been cleared to pick five England internationals including Owen Farrell, Maro Itoje and… [+3827 chars]
